Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: Social media is buzzing with opinions on Australia's upcoming budget. A significant topic of discussion is women's economic inclusion and childcare subsidies with government incentives to encourage more mothers to return to the workforce. Similarly people raise valid criticisms about the government's inclusion of recommendations on women's equality. The debate ranges from tax breaks and subsidies to reduce child poverty and increase JobSeeker payments. Meantime #Insiders is generating mixed reactions on social media as its panel examines how Australia can balance its economy in these times.
